name: cp20231018-BusinessRulesJsNoContext

metadata.Purpose: Expect Failure: Context isn't set on the delivery option, so it will be empty string in the BusinessRule_*.js files. If no validation error present, see https://service.stibosystems.com/browse/RD-22857. Assumes you have a folder under Global Business Rules with ID "Functions".

signedGlobalXml:
<STEP-ProductInformation ContextID=""  WorkspaceID="Main"  ExportTime="2023-10-18 15:39:18"    UseContextLocale="false">

  <BusinessRules>
    <BusinessRule ID="functionCallExample" Scope="Global" Type="Action" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Action #1 (JavaScriptBusinessActionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings>
    <binding alias="node" type="Node" contract="CurrentObjectBindContract"/>
    <binding alias="getDateCode" type="BusinessFunctionScriptingProxy" contract="BusinessFunctionBindContract">
      <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
      <BusinessFunctionReference>
        <BusinessFunction>getDateCode</BusinessFunction>
      </BusinessFunctionReference>
      
    </binding>
  </bindings>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var params = {};
	
log.info(getDateCode.evaluate(params));
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Actions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">functionCallExample</Name>
      <FunctionDependency FunctionID="getDateCode"/>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
    <BusinessRule ID="getDateCode" Scope="Global" Type="Function" RunPrivileged="false">

<!-- Definition:
Function #1 (JavaScriptBusinessFunctionWithBinds):
<config>
  <bindings/>
  <functionparameters/>
  <returntype type="java.lang.String"/>
  <messages/>
  <javaScript>
var now = new java.util.Date();
var currentLocale = java.util.Locale.getDefault();
var dateFormat = java.text.DateFormat.getDateInstance(java.text.DateFormat.DEFAULT, currentLocale);
var dateString = dateFormat.format(now);
log.info(dateString);
  </javaScript>
</config> -->
      <SetupGroupLink SetupGroupID="Functions"/>
      <Name QualifierID="Qualifier root">getDateCode</Name>
      <OnApprove ApproveSetup="Never"/>
      <Configuration></Configuration>
      <ValidObjectTypes AllObjectTypesValid="true"/>
    </BusinessRule>
  </BusinessRules>
</STEP-ProductInformation>
